thread.title: Joe Biden Met a Cute Dog Named Biden and It Was Adorable
thread.title_full: Joe Biden Met a Cute Dog Named Biden and It Was Adorable

author: Ashley Hoffman
title: Joe Biden Met a Cute Dog Named Biden and It Was Adorable
text:
Former Vice President Joe Biden just met a dog named Biden and people on the internet are lapping it up.
Biden has been an enduring meme-able internet sensation. Social media‚Äôs latest material? Biden and a dog of the same name. 
Along with Democrats, Biden marked the seven-year anniversary of the Affordable Care Act at the Capitol in Washington D.C. on Wednesday. He used the opportunity to speak out against the GOP health care bill in an effort to preserve President Barack Obama signature health care law . But he hit an unplanned item on the agenda when he greeted a 4-month-old Golden Retriever who coincidentally shared his namesake.

See the photos of Biden and Biden wordlessly communicate respect, affection below. Bonus: the money shot featuring the dog licking the politician‚Äôs face, the maximum expression of diplomacy.
A post shared by biden (@bidenthegolden) on Mar 22, 2017 at 7:41am PDT 
A post shared by biden (@bidenthegolden) on Mar 22, 2017 at 1:47pm PDT 
@vp44 
A post shared by biden (@bidenthegolden) on Mar 22, 2017 at 11:00am PDT 

The former vice president‚Äôs supporters who feel the world is crucially missing these sweet photo opportunities immediately took to Twitter to cherish the moment. See below for a sampling of internet reactions.
Joe met a dog named Biden on the Hill today and things were okay for the first time since January 20th pic.twitter.com/bs2K4Oc2GS 
‚Äî Hannah (@hb_flynn) March 22, 2017 
Biden the dog licking Biden the Joe. üòç pic.twitter.com/wF5R0MkhSX 
‚Äî Anthony Balderrama (@anthelonious) March 22, 2017 
find someone who looks at you like Biden The Human looks at Biden The Dog pic.twitter.com/X2VSs31qNI 
‚Äî Robbie Couch (@robbie_couch) March 22, 2017 
If and when I ever get a dog, I'm naming him @JoeBiden 
‚Äî Jac Wray (@petty_murphyy) March 22, 2017 
Biden recently spoke at SXSW‚Äôs Connect to End Cancer where he promised to work with the Trump Administration to reach the objectives of Moonshot, an ambitious program aiming to accelerate novel treatments for the disease.
